name: BitNomad
description: NOMAD is someone who cares about the safety of children on the internet. He strives to create a safe environment where children can enjoy and explore the web without risks. NOMAD believes that children are the future and works diligently to provide educational resources and protection tools that ensure the digital world is a safe and beneficial place for them. Thanks to NOMAD's efforts, children can enjoy technology in a safe and positive way.
